DataElement.preferredName: Activity Card Sort Instrumental Activities Total Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric representation of the total score for the Instrumental Activities section of the Activity Card Sort.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Activity Card Sort Instrumental Activities Domain Total Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An assessment tool developed to measure levels of activity engagement in older adults. Participants sort cards depicting people engaged in various activities into categories representing whether the activity is part of the individual's routine._A domain of the Activity Card Sort (ACS) related to crucial activities that may be part of an individual's routine such as driving, paying bills, and child care._The sum of a set of numeric values.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An assessment tool developed to measure levels of activity engagement in older adults. Participants sort cards depicting people engaged in various activities into categories representing whether the activity is part of the individual's routine.

Concepts.definition: An assessment tool developed to measure levels of activity engagement in older adults. Participants sort cards depicting people engaged in various activities into categories representing whether the activity is part of the individual's routine.

Property.preferredDefinition: A domain of the Activity Card Sort (ACS) related to crucial activities that may be part of an individual's routine such as driving, paying bills, and child care.:The sum of a set of numeric values.

Concepts.definition: A domain of the Activity Card Sort (ACS) related to crucial activities that may be part of an individual's routine such as driving, paying bills, and child care.
The sum of a set of numeric values.
